summary: Use this api to update one discount information
description: Use this api to update one discount information

query.name: discount_id
query.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a discount activity.

query.name: item_list
query.description: The items selected to this discount. You can update at most 50 items per call.

query.name: item_id
query.description: Shopee's unique identifier for an item.

query.name: model_list
query.description: The models selected to this discount.

query.name: model_id
query.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a variation of an item. If there is no variation of this item, you don't need to input this param. Dafault is 0.

query.name: model_promotion_price
query.description: The discount price of the item.

query.name: item_promotion_price
query.description: The discount price of the item.

query.name: purchase_limit
query.description: The max number of this product in the promotion price.

schema.name: error
schema.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: message
schema.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: warning
schema.description: Indicate warning message you should take care.

schema.name: request_id
schema.description: The identifier of the API request for error tracking

schema.name: discount_id
schema.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a discount activity.

schema.name: count
schema.description: The number of items that modify successfully.

schema.name: item_id
schema.description: The items which have something error.

schema.name: model_id
schema.description: The models which have something error.

schema.name: fail_message
schema.description: Indicate error details if one element hit error.

schema.name: fail_error
schema.description: Indicate error type if one element hit error.
